LSI between about -0.30 and +0.30 is generally considered "balanced."

This calculator uses an adjusted (carbonate) alkalinity similar to Orenda's approach: Total Alkalinity minus a fraction of CYA and borates, then plugged into the standard LSI formula. Values are approximations for educational and field-use purposes, not a replacement for professional design.
